title: RapTarX
author: RapTarX
content: Parlay is very much as we all know that anything can happen in a bad day. I have lost a parlay because of losing one single match which had an odd of 1.4 I guess. Well, the maximum odd I won from Parlay was around 7 including 4 soccer matches.What's your maximum parlay win (don't share the amount). Share only the odds you got and total matches you have included in your bet.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: I haven't had any winningsnon parlay but I've got a friend who won over 9 odds and that was the first time i got so interested in parlay and wanted to give it a trial but I always try to be contented and not get swept off my feet over an enticing win because I know it might get to fabour me or be my field.How interesting I do see people going doing parlay and I sometimes wonder if I have a wrong conception of parlay which actually implies having more than one wagers and the winnings has to recorded if all the wagers win

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: I forgot the exact odds but the highest parlay win i've hit was around 5.00+ since it was a 4-5 legged. Now I only do 2 to 3 legs at best since I prefer to keep it as short as possible and to avoid cashing out frequently. As there would be rare moments where you'll contemplate if you should cash out a parlay or not after hitting more than half of the legs. One of my unforgettable parlay losses though was from an NBA game where it's the last leg and the team had like 1.1 or 1.2 odds and they somehow threw it.

comments.author: eaLiTy
comments.body: Quote from: RapTarX on December 28, 2022, 05:21:01 PMParlay is very much as we all know that anything can happen in a bad day. I have lost a parlay because of losing one single match which had an odd of 1.4 I guess. Well, the maximum odd I won from Parlay was around 7 including 4 soccer matches.What's your maximum parlay win (don't share the amount). Share only the odds you got and total matches you have included in your bet.The most recent high odds win were 39x this year when i placed bets on 3 events taking the heavy underdog in table tennis. I have a live 10.42 odds bet right now and with three event more to complete which is the Australia South Africa Cricket match and Manchester City Leeds and PSG Strasbourg and i placed a bet on 12 events which includes, Basketball, Darts, Tennis, Cricket and Football and wanted to play it safe  .

comments.author: goinmerry
comments.body: Quote from: RapTarX on December 28, 2022, 05:21:01 PMWhat's your maximum parlay win (don't share the amount). Share only the odds you got and total matches you have included in your bet.Should we also post a screenshot for reference? Regardless, my risk of tolerance depends on the number of parlay legs. For example:- If the parlay will be composed of 5 legs, the odds to consider will be around 1.5 - 1.6.- If the parlay will be composed of 10 legs, the odds to consider will be around 1.2 - 1.3- If the parlay will be composed of max legs available (25 legs on Stake), the odds will always be on the Favorites ranging from 1.1 - 1.2.

comments.author: RapTarX
comments.body: Quote from: eaLiTy on December 28, 2022, 07:51:41 PMThe most recent high odds win were 39x this year when i placed bets on 3 events taking the heavy underdog in table tennis.Damn! That's awesome odd you got there though it was risky going with the underdog. I wouldn't dare to get such underdogs on my parlay or even if I did, I would barely take risk for odd above 3 LOL. You are lucky.Quote from: goinmerry on December 28, 2022, 07:55:54 PMShould we also post a screenshot for reference? No of course. I guess it's a bit of hard request to ask for screenshot as they may be more careful with privacy; lots of gamblers never share their gambling activities publicly I guess. Moreover, there's nothing to prove LOL.

comments.author: rahmad2nd
comments.body: Every time I bet on the parlay option, it all depends on the teams that will compete. I mean, I only focus on a few leagues namely the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga and Ligue 1, including the Champions League and Europa League. of the many matches that will take place every week, I only choose 3 matches. with a note, I will first do a detailed analysis of the many teams that will compete. after that, then I choose which one is appropriate for me to include in my parlay betting slip list.Believe me, the less you bet on the team. the greater your chances of winning. I won't say the amount I've gotten, because I think it's very relative depending on our desire to bet the size of the money at stake. I have a principle, I will only choose 3 fights, after going through the results of the analysis and all the information that I have.To be honest, most of the times I often get wins from parlay bets. even though the odds are small, but if I collect the results it will add to my balance. things to note for those who like this type of parlay, the more matches that are included in the parlay slip list, the smaller your chances of winning the bet.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I've won I think three parlays on stake.com, the most of it if I still remember had five or six games and the odd was around 28 or so, but unfortunately for me I bet with a really small very insignificant amount, I think $0.1 or something like that, and this is because the parlay wasn't mine, I saw it in the event log on stake.com, then I copied it and placed a bet on it, I never believed all the games on that parlay would push through, which is why I betted with that small amount of money, if I had had the slightest idea that the games would push through, I would betted with a higher amount of money to make my winning really significant.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: RapTarX on December 28, 2022, 05:21:01 PMParlay is very much as we all know that anything can happen in a bad day. I have lost a parlay because of losing one single match which had an odd of 1.4 I guess. Well, the maximum odd I won from Parlay was around 7 including 4 soccer matches.What's your maximum parlay win (don't share the amount). Share only the odds you got and total matches you have included in your bet.I won 3 match parlay with 5.x odds or higher, (just recently, you can see it here), and probably I have 4-5 match with 7.x or higher odds. I try to aim to hit more than than 10.x or something but as we all know, parlay is very hard to hit, everything should be perfectly aligned that time, meaning there is a extreme element of luck in your side just like when I won that 3 match play, it was all ML bet and the team that I bet just won with a 1 point lead and there are chances that the opposing team can score and changes the outcome, unfortunately they missed their goal. While the last match, the team needs to overcome a huge lead in the last minute of the game. So there are a lot of tense moments watching the game itself and praying to the Gambling Gods that you will win.  I don't usually look at the odds though, I mean I bet on the team that I think will likely win the match, so if it's lower than 1.4, I will still take that game and include it in my parlay.

comments.author: KTChampions
comments.body: Quote from: RapTarX on December 28, 2022, 05:21:01 PMParlay is very much as we all know that anything can happen in a bad day. I have lost a parlay because of losing one single match which had an odd of 1.4 I guess. Well, the maximum odd I won from Parlay was around 7 including 4 soccer matches.What's your maximum parlay win (don't share the amount). Share only the odds you got and total matches you have included in your bet.By the way, why didn't you yourself write how many games your parlay consisted of and what was the final coefficient? There is an important nuance here - if you make more or less reasonable bets with chances up to 12 (approximately), then it is more profitable to look for a single event with such odds, since the bookmaker's margin will be less than in the case of an accumulator bet. But if you bet with much higher odds, then you can’t do without parlays.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Just a small odds.It's around 25x at the time my betting e-sport. I only betting on Sportbook for e-sport event, especially "DOTA2" every years for International Tournament. Because, that's the only game & analysis I know comparing to Basketball, Footbal or other.Not a fans for sportbook.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Mine parlay/multi odds is maximum @3 with only 1 event. Yes, I don't play NEVER multiple bets. I like to play only single and I think this is the only way to avoid "bad" surprise and the have the chance to maximize profit. sometimes I had to play some parlay but mostly for fun/entertainment with no real chance for a win, just adding some underdogs and trying to win.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: My best parlay ever was a 6 fight parlay in UFC, the multiplier was close to x60, and it was the only time I hit that multiplier in sports betting. I don't like to make Soccer parlays because each game can have 3 outcomes (Win, lose or Tie) and that gives us lower chance to win in any of the matches. That's why I prefer to make parlays in MMA. By the way, some casinos offer live betting, and if a basketball quarter is a tie they pay x15, if you parlay 3 draws and win all of them that would be an x1000. But you need a lot of luck to win it.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on December 29, 2022, 08:29:34 PMBy the way, some casinos offer live betting, and if a basketball quarter is a tie they pay x15, if you parlay 3 draws and win all of them that would be an x1000. But you need a lot of luck to win it.I haven't seen 3 draws (tie score) though in an NBA games, so that is rare, but if you hit it, that's going to be a nice odds. Sportsbet offer 18.00 for a time score after the end of regulation pre-game bet, while Stake offers 15.00.I think the biggest parlay I win is just around 7.x or higher in an NBA games way back, it's a 5 match parlay, and yes, we need a lot of luck to win that games and probably I was just fortunate.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: QueenVera on December 28, 2022, 05:35:55 PMI haven't had any winningsnon parlay but I've got a friend who won over 9 odds and that was the first time i got so interested in parlay and wanted to give it a trial but I always try to be contented and not get swept off my feet over an enticing win because I know it might get to fabour me or be my field.How interesting I do see people going doing parlay and I sometimes wonder if I have a wrong conception of parlay which actually implies having more than one wagers and the winnings has to recorded if all the wagers win What do you mean precisely by 9 odds, you mean the parlay had 9 legs or the total odds of the parlay was over @9.00? 9.00 is not a very high odds for a parlay and it's even quite common I would say. If you don't like parlays because you don't like betting on several different events in one single bet you can start by using insurance on parlays usually offered by reputed sportsbooks.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: QueenVera on December 28, 2022, 05:35:55 PMI haven't had any winningsnon parlay but I've got a friend who won over 9 odds and that was the first time i got so interested in parlay and wanted to give it a trial but I always try to be contented and not get swept off my feet over an enticing win because I know it might get to fabour me or be my field.It's been long time, I can not remember the exact odd of the parlay but it was something over £40 and I had £20 stake in that 8 fold acca. I used to try parlay all the time at that time. Whatever I won from that acca I can guarantee that I lost more than that LOLQuote from: goinmerry on December 28, 2022, 07:55:54 PMFor example:- If the parlay will be composed of 5 legs, the odds to consider will be around 1.5 - 1.6.- If the parlay will be composed of 10 legs, the odds to consider will be around 1.2 - 1.3- If the parlay will be composed of max legs available (25 legs on Stake), the odds will always be on the Favorites ranging from 1.1 - 1.2.I see there are some strategy you are following but do they really works. Sometimes you will find a leg which is obvious win but the odd is higher. One of my favorite strategy was to create a long slip in football matches after the half time in over under goal market. The teams who had higher scoring rate, you can just select over x.5 after 60 minutes. Hit and miss but if you get it right then a 3 fold or 4 fold always have a good chance to win.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: well, I could see that making multibet bets was something very risky and the same as playing the lottery, while also making single bets was something that in the long run is not very profitable, in fact it is even a headache, that's why at the end of the day both multibet betting and single betting are both something that is not profitable in the long term, but speaking from my experience in my case the maximum I have ever won was a game with odds of @9.00, I have already made many bets with odds of @ 7.00 to @9.00but I have to add that my criterion when making a parlay in which the odd reaches @7.00 is that I don't put too many games in the bet because that increases even more the risk of losing bets, so I add games where the odds are in the @1.70 and up and where there is a favorite team and another team is a weak team but due to some events the bookmakers place the two teams almost on the same line of odds, of course these scenarios are not so easy to findThat's why I have to resort to having to follow several sports to put it on the parlay, for example something like putting an NBA game at odds of @1.70 and then 1 league game, then 2 premiership games, then 2 league games Portuguese, with that I try to see if I can hit my multi bet, but I confess that it is not an easy task to hit multi bets with high odds, I am amazed by the guys who constantly manage to hit multi bets with odds of even more than @15.00

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: It got more and more inveigling for me , especially when I knew someone that won 5 multiplayer odds... and also for the reasons that I've had a pre-knowledge about gaming; infact, that' was the reason why I refused to give in Cus I don't even know how long he played to get 'em claims as of late....lol... I won't try that though.Imagine what happened in your case; when a single game with barely two odds ruined the whole thing for you... It's pretty hard to make predictions dude, and the worst of what you get is -- when you think you're sure of the games you wagered, but it turns out the wrong way....so disappointing!Sandra 🧑‍🦰

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: I manage to win 2 leg parlay that involves Haaland on there previous match against Liverpool. I bet for Haaland to score anytime and also as first goal scorer. My odds for the bet at that time was around 7+ odds. I made this bet as an extra bet to my original bet of Haaland score anytime single bet for Duelbits promotion. I never thought that Haaland will score first at that match and this is my first time to successfully win a parlay with odds above 5.0.
